description: Critical clauses absent, incomplete, or contradictory to ADGM regulations.
examples: Missing governing law clause specifying ADGM jurisdiction.
Absence of dispute resolution clause referencing ADGM Courts or arbitration.
Omission of mandatory data protection policy clauses per ADGM DPR.
Employment contracts missing mandatory binding terms or roles.

description: References to non-ADGM jurisdictions invalid under ADGM law.
examples: Clauses referencing UAE Federal Courts instead of ADGM Courts.
Governing law set to jurisdiction outside ADGM.
Use of non-ADGM arbitration centers or authorities.

description: Use of vague terms that reduce enforceability or certainty.
examples: Use of 'may', 'best efforts', 'subject to approval' without clear obligations.
Lack of definitive timelines or responsibilities for parties.
Phrases indicating optional or contingent performance.

red_flag_category: Missing Signatory Sections or Improper Formatting
description: Documents missing required signatures, witnesses, or prescribed ADGM formatting.
examples: Absence of authorized signatory blocks on contracts or resolutions.
Templates lacking official ADGM headers or footers.
Signatories not named or dated properly.

description: Deviation from official ADGM document templates risking rejection.
examples: Use of non-standard clause wording not in ADGM templates.
Omission of mandatory ADGM disclaimer or policy paragraphs.
Altered formatting or missing mandatory sections.
Employment contracts not adhering to ADGM ER templates.
